name: create-object-error
description: Error response for the CreateObject service, indicating which initial property value caused a failure.

fields.name: error-type
fields.description: The error class and code describing the failure.

fields.name: first-failed-element-number
fields.description: The index of the first property value in the list-of-initial-values that caused an error.
